title: The Disappearance: An IBM SkillsBuild Pursuit (2024)
description: As part of my second year software engineering project, we worked with IBM to implement a quest-based RPG to improve engagement with IBM's premier skills program, SkillsBuild. My main contributions related to the development of the character and NPC, in addition to stakeholder communication and liasion.

title: X-Ray Image Repair in OpenCV (2024)
description: An implementation of an image processing program, using OpenCV to repair artificially damaged x-ray images. The program uses a combination of image processing techniques to repair the images, including inpainting and edge detection. This project was completed as part of my image processing coursework, achieving a first-class grade.
